thread.title: QB Ben Roethlisberger returns to practice on a limited basis
thread.title_full: QB Ben Roethlisberger returns to practice on a limited basis

author: wtopstaff
title: QB Ben Roethlisberger returns to practice on a limited basis
text:
Home » News » Sports » NFL » QB Ben Roethlisberger returns… QB Ben Roethlisberger returns to practice on a limited basis By JOHN PERROTTO October 14, 2015 6:38 pm 
PITTSBURGH (AP) — Ben Roethlisberger took a small step toward returning to action and that left his Pittsburgh Steelers’ teammates feeling good. 
The veteran quarterback was a limited participant in practice Wednesday for the first time since spraining the medial collateral ligament in his left knee Sept. 27 during a win over the Rams at St. Louis. 
Roethlisberger took part in non-contact seven-on-seven passing drills. While he is not expected to play in Sunday’s game against the visiting Arizona Cardinals, Roethlisberger appears to be on course to beat the original timetable of missing six weeks. 
“We’re just taking it one day a time,” he said. 
___
